item.title: Microcks Service Accounts
item.description: Microcks Service Accounts Introduction Microcks is using OpenId Connect and OAuth 2.

item.title: Integrating Microcks from Jenkins
item.description: Microcks Jenkins plugin Microcks provides a Jenkins plugin that you may find in its own GitHub repository .

item.title: CLI for Microcks
item.description: Microcks CLI microcks-cli is a command-line tool for interacting with Microcks server APIs.

item.title: Using Microcks from Tekton
item.description: Microcks Tekton The Tekton Pipelines project provides Kubernetes-style resources for declaring CI/CD-style pipelines.

item.title: Using Microcks from GitHub Actions
item.description: Microcks GitHub Actions What is it? Microcks provides 2 GitHub Actions for interacting with a Microcks instance from your GitHub workflows:

item.title: Microcks own's API
item.description: As a tool focused on APIs, Microcks also offers its own API that allows you to query its datastore and control the import jobs and configuration objects.
